Payments

Review Recurring Payments

Please review your information before submitting your payment.

By submitting this Checking account payment, you are authorizing UnitedHealthcare Insurance Company to automatically deduct your monthly premium payments from the Checking account on this form. If you have any questions regarding your automatic payments please contact the number on the back of your member ID card. Payments will be automatically deducted on or around the fifth day of each month.

Payment Type
EFT-Checking (Recurring)

The current premium due each month
